snippet.title: Escaped Chasm
snippet.description:
You can play it at: https://tuyoki.itch.io/escaped-chasm !!!

By Temmie Chang
All pixel art/illustration/story/cutscene animations by Temmie Chang
Cutscene animation sound design is by fatbard https://twitter.com/Fat_Bard
In-game music is by Toby Fox https://twitter.com/tobyfox
Music and sound design for Animated TV shorts by James Roach https://twitter.com/hamesatron
Special thanks help by Archeia https://twitter.com/Archeia_Nessiah

---

This is my first little rpgmaker project I've ever done!! I've always wanted to do one. It took around 5-6 months to complete and the game is around 15-20 minutes long. I hope you like it!! I will try to make more in the future!!
